properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 6:18PM EST until February 21 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
The small craft advisory that was in effect until 8pm this evening
has been cancelled as conditions are below small craft advisory
thresholds west of Moriches Inlet out 20 nm. A new small craft
advisory is now in effect for late Thursday night through Friday
morning.

* WHAT...North winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm
and Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From midnight Thursday night to noon EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO NOON EST FRIDAY
